TopicTitle: Suggestions : Mouse to Aim Flight Mod

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, since many players exprienced hard times to flew planes in KSP One mainly because of the limitation aspect of the basic Keyboard control interface , some modders back then managed to create such an handy mod named Mouse Aim Flight. That ladies and gentlemans, should be a BASIC feature in the game ! So please could you consider to add that feature as soon as possible : For the sake of this Game of course... Plus add real volumetric clouds just like in the KSP 2 trailer you made. 

Don't take it personaI but I actually rather [snip],  than giving you 50 bucks for that rendering with no real game physics improvments. I'm 3000h+ on KSP actually and I was waiting for KSP 2 like for years... I'm sorry I already spent enough time being frustrated on KSP for game physics issues, to not bother my self playing KSP 2. So to avoid this I suggest to point out to fix game physics issues first, then features like mouse aim flight (it litteraly a line long prompt code) the camera tracking for a more cinematic purpose like "Camera Tool" modd. As we could enjoy such great visuals.

So I won't be grumpy about how many of us are disapointed by the actual state of the game's early acces, as it feels like the dev team spent more time doing such fancy trailers than developping the actual game features... '>_> We can definitly feel it so far, so now please, for the sake of the spirit of this game also consider adding a player customized radio station feature (like building an actual Radio Station, later in the game that allow the player to play a custom playlist because when you played ksp for thousands of hours you just cut the music off lol) Thanks for your time and here is my last session on KSP 1 :
